Docs.summary: Calls all Observable instruments which the listener is listening to then calls with every collected measurement.

Docs.typeparam: The type of the numeric measurement.
Docs.param: The callback which can be used to get measurement recording of numeric type T.
Docs.summary: Sets a callback for a specific numeric type to get the measurement recording notification from all instruments which enabled listening and was created with the same specified numeric type. If a measurement of type T is recorded and a callback of type T is registered, that callback will be used.
